b. Bali

b. Bali

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Manuk dadali A. West Java

Dayung sampan C. Banten

pertanyaan Langka
lumayan dapet bonus poin​
Sebuah segitiga dengan tinggi 4 cm dan panjang alasnya 9 cm Maka luas segitiga tersebut adalah​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

18 cm²

Penjelasan:

diketahui:

a = 9 cm

t = 4 cm

ditanya: luas segitiga?

jawab:

L = 1/2 x a x t

= 1/2 x 9 x 4

= 18 cm²

Jawaban:

arti dari kata - kata bahasa batak ' ndang dao tubis sian bonana ' memiliki arti yakni sebagai berikut :

Secara harafiah :

Tidaklah jauh rebung dari pokok bambu.

Artinya :

Tingkah laku atau perangai seorang anak , tidak akan jauh dari tingkah laku atau tidak akan jauh dari perangai ayahnya

What do you man you stupid
 Bahasakan indonesia dengan benar!! Jangan ngasal ok.....

answers.answer:
What do you man you stupid

kalau di translate kan ke Indonesia:

Apa yang kamu lakukan, kamu bodoh

Kalau ga salah,kalau salah HAPUS aja gpp kok(─.─||）

Jawaban:

What do you man, you stupid

adalah sebuah pengucapan mengejek dalam bahasa inggris. Apa arti dari kata bahasa inggris tersebut jika dittransletkan ke bahasa indonesia?

Artinya adalah

= Apa yang kamu lakukan, kamu bodoh

Pengartian ini juga sudah terdeteksi oleh translate.

Terimakasih, semoga membantu

related_questions.question:
Sebutkan beberapa manfaat keragaman karakteristik
masyarakat Indonesia!​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

- Menumbuhkan Sikap Nasionalisme

- Identitas Bangsa di Mata Internasional

- Alat Pemersatu Bangsa

- Sebagai Ikon Pariwisata

- Memupuk Sikap Toleransi

- Menambah Pendapatan Nasional

Penjelasan:

Keberagaman adalah suatu kondisi dalam masyarakat yang terdapat banyak perbedaan dalam berbagai bidang

Answer by : Khairaaqueenapurba

related_questions.question:
UPY
Write at least three of tools in a hospital and the functions!
Answer​

answers.answer:
1.Baby incubator

is a device to provide heat, humidity and controlled oxygen

2.Stethoscope

a medical device used to hear sounds from within the body, especially from the heart

3.UV lamp

Ultra violet (UV) lamp has a function as a radiation sterilizer to kill microorganisms

I hope this help

●• STUDY WITH MEE •

●OETAMA05

JANGAN LUPA JADIKAN BRAINLIEST ANSWER

Stethoscope, doctors in hospitals use this tool to hear the patients heart beats, intestinal movement, breath sounds, etc.

X- ray, X rays are usually used to check fractured bones, but there are more use to x rays

injection, injections are used for injecting a drug or vaccine to a human body

Hari/Tanggal :
Pilihlah salah satu jawaban yang paling tepat!
CHOOSE THE CORRECT ANSWER!
The following text is for number 1 to 8
Galileo Galilei (1564-1642) — Astronomer and Scientist. Galileo developed a superior telescope and made
many significant discoveries in astronomy. He was sentenced to life imprisonment by the inquisition for his
support for the Copernican theory that the sun was at the centre of the solar system.
Galileo was born in Florence, Italy in 1564 to a poor but noble family His parents recognized their child's
innate intelligence and talents and so made sacrifices to have him educated. At his father's insistence, Galileo
studied the profitable career of medicine. But, at the University of Pisa, Galileo became fascinated in a wide
range of subjects. He was also critical of many of Aristotle's teaching which had dominated education for the
past 2,000 years.
Galileo was appointed to be a mathematics professor at the University of Pisa, but his strident criticisms of
Aristotle left him isolated among his contemporaries. After three years of persecution, he resigned and went
the University of Padua, where he taught maths. His entertaining lectures attracted a large following and he
able to spend the next 18 years pursuing his interests in astronomy and mechanics.
1. What type of the text above?
A. Narrative.
B. Report.
Biography​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Narrative

Teks Me-narasikan Kehidupan Galileo Galilei Dari Tahun 1564-1642, dan Penemuannya Serta Galileo Galilei yang berakhir di penjara. CMIIW

Penjelasan:

Semoga Membantu

Jawaban:

10. A

11. C

12.A

13.A

14.C

15.B
